name: c2c Senior Rover (1 day c2c network)
description:
c2c SENIOR ROVER Unlimited weekday travel with time restrictions across the c2c network for anyone aged 65 years or over or holders of a Senior Railcard . Two tickets are available one for the whole of the c2c network between London Fenchurch Street, Southend and Shoeburyness and a cheaper version that excludes 
      the London area (zones 1-6) which excludes London Fenchurch street, Limehouse, West Ham, Barking and Dagenham Dock. Note that this is a weekday rover only and is NOT valid at weekends or on bank holidays. Proof of age is required when purchasing unless in possession of a Senior Railcard otherwise ID like a passport or driving licence is required.

fares_and_restrictions.raw: fares & restrictions Fares correct 1st April 2025 One day rover all stns: £10.00 excluding zones 1-6: £7.00 railcards: no Previous fares ⯈ Previous fares (adult) all zones: 2024 - £10.00 2023 - £10.00 2022 - £10.00 2021 - £10.00 2020 - £10.00 2019 - £9.00 2018 - £9.00 time restrictions Valid after 09:30 but not valid within the London Travelcard area (Zones 1-6) between 16:00-18:59 NOT valid weekends or bank holidays route restrictions Not valid on London Underground train operating companies c2c only purchasing From any c2c ticket office with proof of age

stations: Chalkwell Dagenham Dock East Tilbury Fenchurch Street Grays Laindon
